title: Mastodon Line
summary: The Mastodon line is a neutral hauling line. These ships are comparable to their faction counterparts, and are much cheaper and accessible to newer players. Unfortunately, it does not have a frigate class ship.
full_text:
Mastodon Line
The Mastodon line is a neutral hauling line. These ships are comparable to their faction counterparts, and are much cheaper and accessible to newer players. Unfortunately, it does not have a frigate class ship.
Mastodon Line
Small Hauler
Corvette
Frigate
Destroyer
T1
Hyrax
Zubron
T2
Rhino/Bison
Exotic
*The Hyrax branches off into 2 ships. The Rhino is focused on speed, and the Bison focuses more on cargo capacity.
